items.title: Automate Your G Suite Administration with Google Sheets
items.headline: Save time in G Suite Administration by automating it with this free Google Sheet Add on and become a Pro Admin today.
objectives_summary: After this course, you should be able to save your time in G Suite administration by performing bulk operations in G Suite like creating, deleting, suspending, updating and exporting G Suite users, groups, members, aliases and much more.

items.title: Amazing Automations 1 - Email Signups
items.headline: Automatically track email signups with Googlesheets, Google Scripts, Zapier, & Mailchimp
objectives_summary: Use Zapier to push data from Mailchimp to a spreadsheet
Create a dynamic, automated spreadsheet using advanced formulas including OR, VLOOKUP, HLOOKUP, and Nested IF statements
Customize Embedded Mailchimp Signup form to track email signups from as many landing pages as you want

items.title: Labels Manager for Gmail
items.headline: Manage Your Gmail labels in bulk right from your Google sheet, easily export, create, update or delete Gmail labels.
objectives_summary: Do you want to manage your Gmail labels in bulk? if yes, then this course is for you.
You will learn how to bulk create, update, delete and export your Gmail labels right from your Google sheet without writing a line of code.

items.title: Crea fantásticos dashboards con Google Data Studio y Sheets
items.headline: Utilizando Google Sheets con fuente de datos puedes crear unos increíbles informes, en este curso lo descubrirás.

Aprenderás a calcular promedios, valores más altos, valores más bajos, varianzas.
Crear cuadros de mando para mostrar cuadros de datos exportables y tarjetas de resultados.
